name: Cooperative Trade Networks
option1: You gain 1 influence at the start of your Utilization phase. Your opponent gains one Intel at the start of their Utilization phase.
option2: You gain 1 Intel at the start of your Utilization phase. Your opponent gains one Influence at the start of their Utilization phase.

name: Open Border Policy
option1: Your rebellions start with two more rebel counters.
option2: You and your opponents rebellions start with one more rebel counter

name: Border Control Division
option1: Your opponent can utilize two fewer intel each turn.
option2: You and your opponent can utilize one fewer intel each turn.

name: General Massive Exports
option1: You may utilize one fewer construction each turn. You gain 2 influence at the start of your Utilization phase.
option2: All megastructures cost one fewer construction to construct.

name: Disarmament Commission
option1: You and your opponent can only move one ship each turn.
option2: You and your opponent can move one fewer ship each turn.

name: Peace Sanctions
option1: The first time either player attacks each turn, they lose all generated resources.
option2: The first time your opponent attacks each turn, they lose all generated construction.
